sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id: 1, data: '' } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { console.log(prevProps.currentId, this.state.id) if(prevProps.currentId != this.state.id) { axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.props.currentId}`) .then((response) => { this.setState({id: this.props.currentId, data: response.data}) }) } } render() { console.log(this.state.data.id) return (
